articles.author: Beebom Staff
articles.title: How to Send Instant Video Messages on WhatsApp - Beebom
articles.description: Do you know that you can now send instant video messages on WhatsApp? If not, here is how to send your first video message on WhatsApp!
articles.content: WhatsApp constantly tests out a bunch of different new features on both Android and iOS. One such much-awaited feature that had been in the pipeline for quite some time was the ability to send video … [+2572 chars]
